plot: A man fantasizes about killing his roommate, an inconsiderate buffoon, who may be the worst roommate in the history of roommates.
title: Kill My Roommate
plot_es: A man fantasizes about killing his roommate, an inconsiderate buffoon, who may be the worst roommate in the history of roommates.
plot_en: A man fantasizes about killing his roommate, an inconsiderate buffoon, who may be the worst roommate in the history of roommates.
